Subject: How to get Directory Service group into Device Control group
Description: I synced in and created a new EPP -> Directory Services ->Microsoft AD group called "CIGWL Information Governance Watchlist" using documentation of the link below. The issue is how do I get that group and the members attributed to it in a Device Control - Group so that I can set access restrictions on devices? https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4/page/Content/EndpointProtector/Admin/DirectoryServices/Overview.htm
What_We_Know__c:
We asked for a remote session.

During the meeting, we deleted the initial AD sync and created a new one, which successfully worked
Solution_Comment__c: During the meeting, we deleted the initial AD sync and created a new one, which successfully worked.
